title: Road area only to the extent of 15% shall be calculated in this component for which compensation in the form of FSI shall be allowed in-situ
clause_text: Road area only to the extent of 15% shall be calculated in this component for which compensation in the form of FSI shall be allowed in-situ. The road area over and above 15% shall be calculated in the owner's / developer's share.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
